column4: when i turn on my computer, the GRUB menu list is displayed... it says press enter or something... this list appears very fast... how can i make it stay for, say, 5 seconds and not just 1 sec...   ??
please assist me so i don't mess up anything
did u open that with gedit?
u need to edit the number which is in front of "timeout" . btw the word does have any # symbol in front of "timeout"
be polite
wait have patience since i am sure how to do that
i haven't had that problem before, then i reinstalled gutsy and i got this issue
is the desktop at correct resolution?
give me sometime
you alive?
searching...  u can ask others too
found anything?
perhaps u have to reconfigure ur xorg.conf
i don't wanna mess with Xorg.conf
it's simple
i messed up things once really bad... so i had to reinstall
you won't talk me into it
i am not asking u to edit it . i am just asking u to re-run the script
why did this work beautifully when i first installed gutsy... ??  then after reinstall this shit happened?? huh?
how to rerun the script?
sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
